doc.field: Series I: Labor unions and organizations
Series I: Labor unions and organizations
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials

Uniting telephone workers, mail carriers, typographic and print unions, and chapters of the Newspaper Guild, this series assembles serials issued by communications workers, with the majority of titles dating between 1950-1990. Around 150 newsletters from individual chapters of the Communications Workers of America, mainly dating from the 1980s, document a range of local union activities across the United States. The series also contains bulletins issued by striking workers at Bell, AT&T, and the Bay Guardian.
